import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import "./MainList.css" import useMainHook from "../../Hooks/Main/useMainHook" import { useRecoilState } from "recoil"; import {mainPageNum} from "../../stores/mainState" import TimeCounting from "time-counting"; import moment from "moment" const MainList = () => { const { getProject,project,setProject } = useMainHook(); const [pageNum,setPageNum] = useRecoilState(mainPageNum); useEffect( async ()=>{ getProject(pageNum).then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data.projectList) setProject(res.data.projectList) }) },[]) return(
{ project.map((project)=>( <> {console.log(project)} )) }
제목 작성자(리더) 내용 생성 날짜 좋아요 태그 삭제여부
{project.title} {project.users[0].name} 가나다라마바사아자차카타파하 {moment(project.creatAt).format('MMMM Do YYYY, h:mm:ss a')} 18개 {project.tags[0]}
삭제
) } export default MainList;
